text: Had brunch. Food was good. Servers could use some training. Had signs up moving.soon.
One of my fav sandwiches here is The Big Bruno!  Try it, you will come back time and time again for this sandwich!   Plus, the fresh cut fries are delicious!

I created my own omelet. They give you 3 toppings in the price and 50Â¢/topping after that. It came with either hash browns or home fries. Got the hash browns. I mixed everything together and added some hot sauce.  best breakfast I've had in a LONG tIme. The server was pleasant and attentive. But the food...the food was SO good!!!

Nice family owned spot. Had hash and eggs. Was ok.  Being Irish i like my hash potatoes diced not shredded. Iike my beef shredded not diced. This hash was just that shredded potatoes and diced corned beef. Kinda not really hashy.... Eggs were fresh. Coffee was fresh. Waitress very fast and friendly. Went back the other day closed for vacation in August. I will return.

Everything  we had was very good. I had breakfast for dinner. It was super. My son had "The Burgh" it was sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo good. We will certainly be back. I hope this one stays in Charleroi. It is good to have some variety with quality in this depressed Mon Valley Town.
